text: Lottery! is an American anthologic drama. It was on ABC on September 9, 1983. The series aired for one season of 17 episodes. The show starred Ben Murphy as Patrick Sean Flaherty, and Marshall Colt as Eric Rush. Lottery! was about ordinary people who won the lottery and became millionaires. ==Ratings== Season Episodes Start Date End Date Nielsen Rank Nielsen Rating Tied With 1983-84 17 September 9, 1983 June 14, 1984 77 12.5 N/A ==Episodes== No. Title Directed by Written by Original air date ==Awards and nominations== Year Award Result Category Recipient 1984 Young Artist Awards Nominated Best Young Actor, Guest in a Television Series Corey Feldman ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 American television series debuts Category:1984 American television series endings Category:1980s American drama television series
